alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 4:28PM EDT until May 22 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN LEBANON COUNTIES... At 428 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Strausstown to Schaefferstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ephrata, Lititz, Manheim, Cornwall, Akron, Myerstown, Denver, Reamstown, Rothsville, Newmanstown, Adamstown and Avon. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 268 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
